thread.title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
thread.title_full: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines

title: US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines
text: > Top News US teams look for future Paralympians at scouting combines In this Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 photo high school freshman Matthew Freitas, of Weymouth, Mass., right, runs with the ball as eighth grader Sean O'Brien, left, also of Weymouth, keeps pressure on during a game of flag football, in Weymouth. This weekend, Freitas will join other athletes with physical and visual disabilities hoping to get noticed at a scouting event for the U.S. Paralympics. (AP Photo/Steven Senne)
